data.name: Evaverse
data.detailed_description:
SOCIAL IMMERSION WONDERLAND


EVAVERSE offers a social immersion platform for friends and players to hang out together in a brand new digital world. It's designed to be an ever-evolving digital landscape that can be shaped by our community of players. Future game mechanics and playstyles can be voted on by the community and developed as the game progresses over time.

Hoverboard racing is the latest update to the world of the Evaverse. All players can race for free by toggling the race panel in-game. Players may also host their own servers or join others as they hang out inside the EVAVERSE. Servers have voice chat and a variety of mini-games to play while spending time in the EVAVERSE.

MINI GAMES FOR RELEASE
  • Hoverboard Races- Race across the Evaverse on a hoverboard
  • Railgun - Shoot players and stun them from across the map
  • Low Gravity - Climb the tallest peaks by modifying your gravity settings
  • Bowling - Set up some pins to knockdown
  • Soccer - Create a ball to kick around
  • Tag - Keep away from the person who is it

The EVAVERSE game will continue to grow and expand in future releases and will always be free-to-play!

data.short_description: Welcome to the EVAVERSE, the next generation of social immersion platforms, empowering players to connect in a brand new metaverse world with mini-games!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700 X
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 64 bit Processor (Intel or Silicon)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
